textAfterTable: AGENCY NAME: Adoptions of Indiana ADDRESS: 1980 E. 116th Street, Suite 325, Carmel IN 46032 PHONE: 317-574-8950 FAX: 317-574-8971                E-MAIL ADDRESS: msterchi@ad-in.org GEOGRAPHIC AREA SERVED: Indiana: Statewide Service Fee Charged Approximate Waiting Period Home Study Assessment     Step-Parent/Relative $500.00 Start within 2 weeks Independent $1,850.00 Includes PPS; start within 2 weeks Non-Special Needs $1,850.00 Includes PPS; start within 2 weeks Special Needs $1,850.00 Includes PPS; start within 2 weeks Foreign $2,000.00 Includes PPS; start within 2 weeks Foster Parent none   Infant (non-special needs) $1,850.00 Includes PPS; start within 2 weeks Interstate   See below (child placement) Up-date $1,450.00 Includes PPS; start within 2 weeks Child Placement     Special Needs   Independent agency (through attorney, international agency) Non-Special Needs   Independent agency (through attorney) Infant   Independent agency (through attorney) Siblings   Independent agency (through attorney) Independent   Independent agency (through attorney) Foreign   Independent agency (through international agency)
